it.polimi.se2019.server.actions

Class ActionUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.ActionUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Targetable, java.io.Serializable

    public class ActionUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Targetable
    The action unit is the basic action used in the game, it has effects and conditions to be triggered. Other variable stored here are used to help build the clients.
    Author:
    FF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.util.List<Effect> effectList,
                  java.util.List<Condition> conditionList,
                  boolean unidirectional,
                  int numPlayerTargets,
                  int numTileTargets,
                  boolean playerSelectionFirst)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        available - indicates whether the action is readily available.
        name - is the name of the action unit.
        effectList - is the list of the effects.
        conditionList - is the list of conditions.
        unidirectional - is a boolean parameter that indicates whether a direction is asked as tile.
        numPlayerTargets - is the maximum number of players to be selected.
        numTileTargets - is the maximum number of tiles to be selected.
        playerSelectionFirst - is a boolean parameter that indicates
